meanings.definition: Guenons: a group of small to medium-sized monkeys found in sub-Saharan Africa.
meanings.sent1: The guenons playfully swung from tree to tree in the jungle.
meanings.sent2: We saw a family of guenons grooming each other in the wild.
meanings.sent3: The guenons decided to have a banana-eating contest for fun.
meanings.sent4: The guenons' agility in the trees was like a dance in the forest.
meanings.sent5: The colorful fur of the guenons made them stand out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: Guenons: plural form of guenon, referring to multiple monkeys of this species.
meanings.sent1: A troop of guenons chattered noisily as they foraged for food.
meanings.sent2: The guenons' calls echoed through the dense jungle, signaling danger.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous guenons stole all the bananas from the campsite.
meanings.sent4: The guenons' unity in times of trouble was admirable.
meanings.sent5: The playful antics of the guenons entertained the onlookers for hours.
